ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($User.Id <> $Label.UserId), IF( AND(ISPICKVAL( LeadSource, 'Channel Partner'),RW_Apply_Unregistered_Broker__c==false), ISBLANK( RW_Broker__c ) , false), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
